description: Copies a model to another region so that it can be used there. For more information, see Copy models to be used in other regions in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: sourceModelArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model to be copied.

parameters.name: targetModelName
parameters.description: A name for the copied model.

parameters.name: targetModelTags
parameters.description: Tags to associate with the target model. For more information, see Tag resources in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide. (dict) --- Definition of the key/value pair for a tag. Key for the tag. Value for the tag.

parameters.name: clientRequestToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure that the API request completes no more than one time. If this token matches a previous request, Amazon Bedrock ignores the request, but does not return an error. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: jobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model copy job.
